readme:
# Premium

_Premium_ is a syntax theme for Atom based on the original [Premium theme](http://premiumpixels.com/freebies/code-editor-app-psd/) for Coda 2, by [Orman Clark](http://twitter.com/ormanclark).

It's still a work in progress. If you encounter any bugs, inconsistencies or if you know a better method to do something, feel free to open an issue or make a pull request. Any help is appreciated. :)

![Screenshot of Premium syntax theme.](http://cldup.com/asH9h05GtD.png)
